<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ReportUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Filtering supported report types.</description>
        <name>ReportUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ReportUtil = Class.create();
ReportUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	selectSupportedReport: function() {

		validReportsTypes = ["type=single_score", "line", "step_line", "area", "spline", "bar", "horizontal bar", "donut"];

		if (current.type == "report") {
			validReportTypes.join("^ORtype=");
			return validReportTypes;
		}
		else
			return "";
	},

    type: 'ReportUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-11-24 12:55:35</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5a76aa79b751001096aa25efce11a926</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ReportUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">0ced34cb6d2220100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5a76aa79b751001096aa25efce11a926</sys_update_name>

</record_update>
